channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Massive sofas flytipped on Elcot Avenue!, 11th August
item.description:
This is getting crazy now. Please remove and install signage to stop the people doing this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Friary Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 abandoned bikes locked to council bike stand, 11th August
item.description:
2 abandoned bikes in total disrepair locked to council bike rack, deeming it unuseable. They have been there for more than 1 year. Please get them removed asap. On North/West side of the Helmsley Place. There is just 1 rack there and not available.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Helmsley Place, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattresses - flytipping, 11th August
item.description:
People keep fly tipping outside our flats which has been persistent for years now and nothing is being done about this. My bike is in the green hangar and I can’t get to it as I do not want to touch disgusting mattresses / pieces of furniture. This is my only way of transportation at present and it really id getting on my nerves.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stevenson Crescent, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Farmfoods shopping trolley full of wood and broken homewear, dumped at entry to galleon close, 11th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Galleon Close, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
